Title: Episode One
Plot: The group realise that Nathan is still alive. The friends run into a psychiatric patient, who used to be obsessed with Simon, and find out that she is using her strange powers to exact revenge after he snubbed her in public.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Craig Parkinson, Evelyn Hoskins, Michael Obiora, Alex Reid
